title: Drawing, "Washington Irving's Library at Sunnyside", March 16, 1860
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on grey/green wove paper
inscribed: Lower margin: with Geo D Morgan. Washington Irving Library / March 16/60.
description: A library with a desk in the center and a chair to the right, before windows and bookshelves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Washington Irving's Library at Sunnyside", March 16, 1860.
March 16, 1860. Graphite, brush and white gouache on grey/green wove paper. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1942-50-156.
